posts.post_content: This Bauble, along with other Baubles, allow you to draw cards for cheap, which was vital in many decks that requires you to skip draws, such as Necropotence. The reason being that, in critical moment when you need a card but cannot afford the alternative payment, you got to draw with a Bauble.
posts.html:
